text: KSSI (102.1 FM, "I-Rock") is a commercial radio station that is licensed to China Lake, California, United States and serves the Ridgecrest area as well as the US-395 corridor in the Eastern Sierra region. The station is owned by Sound Enterprises and broadcasts a mainstream rock format. ==History== KSSI first signed on in 1995 on the 102.7 FM frequency with a classic rock format. In 2015, KSSI moved from 102.7 FM to 102.1. As "I-Rock", KSSI broadcasts a broad-based rock format consisting of a fine mix of classic rock artists, alternative rock selections, and heavy metal music. ==References== ==External links== * * SSI Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States Category:Ridgecrest, California Category:Radio stations established in 1975
title: KSSI
